summary: I am a recent Computer Science graduate from Wilfrid Laurier University with a passion for technology and education. I love helping others and learning about the problems that are affecting my community . I feel most fulfilled when I am able to help solve a problem using my creativity while also challenging myself and learning new skills. I am most excited about how artificial Intelligence will progress and help better the lives of people around the world by providing solutions for many global as well as local issues.
